1314930.name: Speed Swing
1314930.description: Speed Swing is a highly challenging level based grappling hook game, where the objective is to reach the end of each level as fast as possible. The game holds 20 different levels each increasing in difficulty. The unique grapple hook mechanic creates difficult, but rewarding game play. Improve your times on each level to try and achieve the fastest possible cumulative time.
1314930.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
